description: Boolean Flag to Add (Create New) operation only.

Talent_Management_PoolObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Talent_Management_PoolObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Talent_Management_PoolObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Holds (Talent_Pool_ID) Reference to Talent Pool update.

Talent_Pool_Data.description: Setting this value to true will remove Static Talent Pool memberships (worker) prior to adding membership as listed in service request.    If set to false, it will keep existing worker membership and then process membership as listed in service request.  Default is False.
Holds Talent Pool Name attribute value
Holds Talent Pool Description attribute value
Holds Talent Pool Inactivate boolean value
Restricted Pool is used to specify whether the talent pool is restricted or not.
This Boolean value is used to specify if the succession/talent pool will be excluded from processing during the Remove Worker from Talent business process

Static_Talent_Pool_Member.description: Setting value to true will remove this worker membership from Static Talent Pool.  If set to false, worker membership remains to the talent pool.  Default is FALSE.

WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Static_Talent_Pool_Member.description: Holds Worker reference which is used to add membership to Static Talent Pool.

Talent_Pool_Data.description: Holds element which contain Talent Pool Worker membership.

description: This Element contains Talent Pool ID, Name, Inactive (boolean), and worker membership to this talent pool
